otherNames: Wu Ling Sword Master, Esprit Martial : l'Épée, Martial Spirit Sword Master, Martial Spiritual Sword Lord, Rebirth of Sword Master, Võ Linh Kiếm Tôn, Wu Ling (Martial Spirit) Sword Master, Wu Ling Jian Zun, Wǔ Líng Jiàn Zūn, 武灵剑尊, 무령검존
synopsis: The Sword is the victim of betrayal: The love of his life killed him on their wedding night. However, the will of the heavens is unpredictable. Instead of following his body in death, he founds himself reincarnated. Let’s look at Mu Yuan, who bears the deep hatred of the blood and his thirst for revenge. Now he is preparing to return to the Spirit Domain, even if it means killing in its path!
